ComicInfo.Title: Automatic - One; OnlyFriends; Art Dolls; Cascading; Automatic - Two
ComicInfo.Penciller: Chiara Colasanti, Kelsi Jo Silva, Jenn St-Onge, Elena Ominetti, Daphne Red
ComicInfo.Inker: Chiara Colasanti, Kelsi Jo Silva, Jenn St-Onge, Elena Ominetti, Daphne Red
ComicInfo.Summary:
THIRSTY is a graphic novel made up of four sexy stories that overlap in fun, exciting ways.
Imagine a night that ends with enlightening discovery behind your date's closet door...
Imagine a sex shop of the future, where you cna customize your desires...
Imagine a woman setting out to create her own sexy videos, on a quest to find just the right partner for the job...
Imagine a late-night drive in a car designed to read your deepest fantasies...
These stories, drawn by some of comics' top talent, make for the spiciest graphic novel you'll read this year.
